entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • A possible opportunity for optimization in ImmutableArrayExtensions.GetTypesFromMemberMap #67991
  • An opportunity for optimization in ImmutableArrayExtensions.CreateNameToMembersMap #67990
  • Hard crash and/or gold bars when editing a file that contains aliases to pointer types #67989
  • `void` keyword not recommended in "using unsafe" directive #67986
  • Unexpected recommendations after `unsafe` keyword in using declarations #67985
  • `unsafe` keyword is not recommended in using directives #67984
  • CI test failure: Roslyn.VisualStudio.NewIntegrationTests.VisualBasic.BasicEncapsulateField.EncapsulateThroughLightbulbIncludingReferences #67981
  • CI test failure: Roslyn.VisualStudio.NewIntegrationTests.VisualBasic.BasicArgumentProvider.TabTabCompleteObjectEquals #67980
  • Assertion in NullableWalker.VisitConditionalOperatorCore failing in bootstrap build #67975

Closed

  • `unsafe` keyword should be marked as redundant if the using unsafe directive doesn't require it #67988
  • GeneratedCodeAnalysisFlagsMap is slow being segmented dictionary #67909
    17.7 P1
  • Stop deploying System.ValueTuple in Roslyn.VisualStudio.Setup.Dependencies #29705
    Compiler.Next
  • File-scoped IsExternalInit type is used in modreq for `init` accessors #67079
    C# 12.0
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Expose an optional FilterSpan public API on SyntaxTreeAnalysisContext and SemanticModelAnalysisContext #67257
    17.7
  • Remove locking from ProjectSystemProjectFactory (and use Workspace's lock instead). #67510

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid retaining memory while waiting for changes #67982
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid accessing DocData prior to document initialization #67978
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix conditional operator nullable walker assertion #67977
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Interceptors 3 #67971
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add interceptors open design questions #67970
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix CompletionResolve tests #67983
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to release/dev17.7 #67969
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #67992
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Share common code involved into building dictionaries of members for namespace symbols #67933
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #67987
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Remove ValueTuple workaround #67837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Flow the telemetry update change from feature branch to 17.2 release branch #67902
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Call `PrimaryDependency` getter once in `PENamedTypeSymbol.GetUseSiteInfo` #67927
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Avoid rooting documents for languages that support syntax trees #67960
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Work to unify threading concepts between Workspace and ProjectSystemProjectFactory (part1) #67522
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not return file-local type requested by unmangled metadata name #67183
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Add FilterSpan API to analyzer contexts #67818
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Incremental Generators documentation fixes #67593
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #67973
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Don't provide CodeActionWithDialog if option service is null #67951
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Flow the telemetry update change from feature branch to 17.0 release branch #67901
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update configs for 17.7 p1 snap #67964
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update features/interceptors from main #67966
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Snap 17 7 #67968
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove code lens cache to improve results returned #67884
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #67994
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Work to unify threading concepts between Workspace and ProjectSystemProjectFactory (part2) #67524
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add `IsExplicitExtension` #67850
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Test the EditorFeatures layer on net472 and net6.0-windows #61234
    Area-IDE, 17.5 P3
  • Avoid stack overflow due to deep recursion on long chain of calls. #67913
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • EnC refactoring: Align wrappers with contracts better #67967
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Deprecate CompilationWithAnalyzers.IsDiagnosticAnalyzerSuppressed public API #67671
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Avoid reusing ref receiver temp #67955
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Locals and Returns, untriaged
  • Pool `BindingDiagnosticBag`s #67954
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Feedback on caching constructed Nullable<T> types #67807
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC refactoring: ProjectBaseline, ProjectDiagnostics, PendingUpdate #67941
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #67925
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
